venue.address_1: 45 South Main St., Suite 100, West Hartford, CT 06107
venue.name: Wu Healing Center

item.description:
This workshop is specificially formulated for people with arthritis, fibromyalgia, MS, Lyme disease rhumatiod arthritis, allergies, any other immune deficiency condition. Qi Gong exercises to strengthen immunity will be taught. Changes in diet, teas and Chinese herbs will be discussed. Specific Acupoints on the ear and meridians of the body for immunity will be shown.Â  Other Chinese healing techniques will also be demonstrated.

Contact Erik at 860-593-8397 or chiforhealing.com for more information.
item.name: Chinese Medicine for Immunity-Self-healing for arthritis or any immune condition
